This repository contains the NBA positions dataset.
The main dataset is designed to replace the iris dataset and contains basic statistics about 150 NBA Centers, Point Guards and Shooting Guards from 2017.
There is a also a expanded dataset (nba_positions_full) the includes the same statistics for all NBA players in 2017.
